title: WANTED: Hall Of Fame portraits, backs etc.
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Hall Of Fame portraits, backs etc.
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone. While this may be slightly vague, I am interested in acquiring some Hall of Fame portrait cards should anyone have interest in parting with any. Further, common players with interesting backs are also of interest. 

I am interested in cards which are lower to mid grade (2-4 range) with respectable eye appeal. 

Some of the players I covet would be Lajoie, Eddie Collins, Speaker (not a portrait, I know), Matty, Walsh, Chance, Evers, Tinker, Chesbro, Bender and other similar studs.

If you would like to share possible options and imagery with me please feel free to do so via email at [url]t206society@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you very much.

Derek

Yes Sir! I am interested in most HOF ... though I will not be going after the lower end gents at this time nor do I have the funds to go for a green Cobb. Everything in between would be of some interest assuming a respectable eye appeal. Further, commons are nice if they have an interesting back as well.

Should you have any you would like to chat about I will be happy to.

Thank you very much.

Derek
